oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George T. Brown, Sergeant-at-Arms of the [U.S.] Senate, serving the summons on President Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Illustration in "Harper's Weekly," March 28, 1868, p. 193, shows President Andrew Johnson, attended by Col. W. G. Brown, being served an impeachment summons by George T. Brown, Sergeant-at-arms of the United States Senate, in the White House.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: T. R. Davis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Andrew, 1808-1875; United States. Congress. Senate; Trials (Impeachment); Reconstruction (U.S. History, 1865-1877)
Periodical illustrations
